coupon_general_type.label: How many coupons
coupon_general_type.comment:
Each: every "Required Review qty" multiple is reached, a new coupon will be sent.
Only once: a coupon is sent only the first time that "Required Review qty" is reached.
Specific: same as Each but also defines a fixed qty of coupons to be sent.

coupon_order_counter.label: Min. items reviewed per order
coupon_order_counter.comment: How many items needs to be reviewed per order to win a coupon (0 means all items requires a review).

coupon_order_almost.label: Min. item qty in Order
coupon_order_almost.comment: Order needs to have at least this quantity of items to apply for a coupon (0 means all Orders applies, no matter how many items were ordered).

coupon_order_max.label: Max. coupons for Customer
coupon_order_max.comment: 0 means there's no limit of coupons that a Customer can win.
